resources.string:
Hi, my name is Sayan Manna. 

I'm 21 years old and i'm currently pursuing my Bachelors in Technology, 

more specifically majoring in Information Technology. 

I've recently developed interest in android development 

and so far, i'm having a lot of fun 

in building android apps. 

I also like to be athletic and perform some or the other form 

of physical exercise be it hitting the gym 

or, play sports. 

I also like to listen to music while i'm 

doing my everyday chores. It helps me to focus better.
